name: FOB Solutions OÜ
tagline: We raise the bar of mobile experience
description:
We solve business challenges through smart device software development and reach out to mobile customers. International team with specialists from Tallink, Playtech, Skype and Pipedrive.
Get a wide-range of satisfied mobile customers.
More than 100 smart devices in-house ready for your development needs.
